form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: APPLICATION FOR IMMIGRANT VISA AND ALIEN REGISTRATION

full_text: Screened by NARA, 6/29/2023 1 Form FS-256a FOREIGN SERVICE OF THE UNITED STATES OF AMERICA (Revised 12-1-56) Form approved. Budget Bureau No. 47-R108.5. APPLICATION FOR IMMIGRANT VISA I- 314999 AND ALIEN REGISTRATION I, the undersigned, being duly sworn, state the following facts regarding myself and hereby make application for an IMMIGRANT VISA and ALIEN REGISTRATION under the Immigration and Nationality Act to the American Consul at MANAGUA, NICARAGUA : 1. Family name Given name Initial 2. Date and place of birth Leon, Nicaragua Age DELGADO Ocampo, Delia Isabel April 28, 1915 45 3. Other names used or by which known 4. Present address none 4a Calle E,Managua, Nicaragua 5. If going to relative, friend or organization, state name and address in 6. Address of final destination in United States, if any, unless stated in Item 5 United States Rosa Cole - cousin See 5 1104 N. Alma Avenue, Los Angeles, Calif. 7. Name and address of father 8. Name and address of mother 9. If neither parent living, name and address of next of kin in home country Carlos Delgado Carmen Ocampo deceased deceased Claudio Arguello (cousin) Frente a la Funeraria La Corona, Managua, Nic. 10. Color of 11. Height 12. Weight 13. Complexion 14. Marks of identification 15. Sex 16. Marital Status Hair Eyes Male Married Single black brown 5 ft. in. 147 lbs. fair none Female Widowed Divorced 17. Calling or occupation 18. Nationality NICARAGUAN 21. Languages Spoken Read Written 19. Race Spanish American SPANISH 20. Ethnic classification House wife Spanish American 22. Intended port of entry into United States 23. I (dex (do not) have a ticket to final 24. Purpose of going to United States Los Angeles, Calif. destination. To reside 25. Places of principal residence after sixteenth birthday City or Town Province Country From-To Occupation Managua, Nicaragua House wife - 26. Names and places of residence of spouse and children 27. I claim to be a nonquota Xrefexendexquota immigrant for the following reasons: FOIA (b)(6) Sec. 101 (a) (27) (c) I was born in the Republic of Nicaragua. Children: Milagraos and Maria Jerez live with aunt in Managua. 28. Documents submitted in support of this application and made a part hereof, are as follows: Bond letter from Immigration and Naturaliza- tion Service. Baptism Certificate Affidavit in lieu of BIRTH CERTIFICATE HEALTH CERTIFICATE X-RAY GOOD CONDUCT CERTIFICATE 29. I have nevo been arrested, convicted, in prison, in an almshouse, treated in an institution or hospital or other place for insanity or other mental disease, or the beneciary of a pardon or an amnesty, except as stated below: never 30. I have never applied to any American consular officer, either formally or informally, for a visa or other documentation as an immigrant or nonimmigrant, except as stated below: never (a) I have never been excluded nor deported from the United States, except as stated below: b) I have never been removed from the United States at Government expense, except as stated below: never (Application continued on reverse side) 16-73220-1
